source.114b45aa:
s=0
print("Escreva a tolerancia")
k = float(input())
x0=2
mult=1
s= s+mult*(1/x0)+1 #O 1 foi incluido diretamente na soma
x1= x0+2
E = abs((1/x0)-1)
i=1
while E >= k:
    x0=x0+2
    mult= mult*(-1)
    s= s+mult*(1/x0)
    x1= x0+2
    i=i+1
    E = abs(((1/x1))-(1/x0))
print("A soma é: ", s)
source.12583538:
print("Escreva um n")
n= int(input())
x0=1
x1=1
xi= x0+x1
i=3
x0=x1
x1=xi
while i!=n:
    xi= x0+x1
    i=i+1
    x0=x1
    x1=xi
print("O numero é: ",xi)
source.5fcacf40:
print("digite n")
n= int(input())
f0=1
i=1
fi= i * f0
f0=fi
while i != n:
    i=i+1
    fi= i * f0
    f0=fi    
print("O valor é: ",fi)
source.1cd730bf:
print("Informe o valor de x")
x= float(input())
c0=1-x
a0=1
c1= (c0)**2
a1=a0*(1+c0)
E=abs(a1-a0)
c0=c1
a0=a1
while E>=10**(-9):
    c1= (c0)**2
    a1=a0*(1+c0)
    E=abs(a1-a0)
    c0=c1
    a0=a1
print("O valor é: ", a1)
source.64567e53:
x2=1
x1=1
s=0
s=s + (x2/x1)
while x2 != 99 and x1 != 50:
    x2=x2+2
    x1=x1+1
    s=s + (x2/x1)
print("A soma é: ",s)
source.c40c2dd6:
x2=2
x1=50
s=0
while x1 != 1:
    s= s+ (x2/x1)
    x2= x2*2
    x1=x1-1
print("A soma é: ",s)
source.f6f845e6:
xm=38
xd=1
s=0
while xd != 37 :
    s=s+((xm*(xm-1))/xd)
    xm=xm-1
    xd= xd+1
print("A soma é: ",s)
source.1d42bb6c:
xs=1
xb=1
mult=1
s=0
s= (mult*(xs/(xb**2)))
xs=xs+1
xb=xb+1
mult= mult*(-1)
while xs != 10:
    s= s + (mult*(xs/(xb**2)))
    xs=xs+1
    xb=xb+1
    mult= mult*(-1)
print("A soma é: ",s)
source.891e3dc9:
xs= 1000
xb= 1
mult=1
s= (mult*(xs/xb))
xs=xs-3
xb=xb+1
mult=mult*(-1)
while xb != 50:
    s= (mult*(xs/xb))
    xs=xs-3
    xb=xb+1
    mult=mult*(-1)
print("A soma é:",s)
source.96c1dc5e:
xs= 480
xb=10
mult=1
s= (mult*(xs/xb))
xs=xs-5
xb=xb+1
mult=mult*(-1)
while xb !=39:
    s= s + (mult*(xs/xb))
    xs=xs-5
    xb=xb+1
    mult=mult*(-1)

source.edebdea9:
xd=3
mult=-1
s= 4 + (mult*(4/xd))
xd=xd+2
mult=mult*(-1)
while xd != 10000001:
    s= s + (mult*(4/xd))
    xd=xd+2
    mult=mult*(-1)
print("Pi é igual a:", s)
source.e8ead528:
xd=1
mult=1
s= mult*(1/(xd**10))
mult= mult*(-1)
xd= xd+2
while xd != 1+2**50:
    s= mult*(1/(xd**3))
    mult= mult*(-1)
    xd= xd+2
pi= (s*32)**(1/3)
print("Pi é igual a: ",pi)
source.c7c1a417:
print("Escreva x ")
x= float(input())
exp=25
div=1
mult=1
s= mult * (( x**(exp)) /div)
mult= mult * (-1)
exp= exp - 1
div= div + 1
while div != 25:
    s= s + mult *(( x ** (exp)) / div )
    mult= mult *(-1)
    exp= exp - 1
    div= div + 1
print("A somatória é: ",s)
source.8b1aed43:
xs=1
xb=15
mult=1
s= mult*((xs)/(xb)**2)
mult=mult*(-1)
xs=xs*2
xb=xb-1
while xb != 1:
    s= s + mult*((xs)/(xb)**2)
    mult=mult*(-1)
    xs=xs*2
    xb=xb-1
print("A soma é:", s)

source.82839cbe:
4. O fatorial de um número pode ser expresso
pela seguinte relação: n! = 1 × 2 × 3 × . . . × n ,
para n ≥ 0. Além disso, podemos definí-lo também utilizando a relação de recorrência abaixo.

f(i) = i × f(i − 1), i > 0
f(0) = 1
Assim, faça um algoritmo que leia um número
inteiro positivo do usuário, calcule o seu fatorial
usando a relação de recorrência acima e escreva
o resultado na saída.
